about.title: ABOUT ME
about.text: I am a Full-stack web developer, but I specialize in Front-end development. I trained academically at Academlo and self-taught for the last 2 years.
about.foot: I work in the growth of projects, using Front-End programming tools, I am constantly learning, improving my skills.
